author: Simon Difford
description: A liquid After Eight. Some will prefer to stir, rather than shake this cocktail but it's better to "shake it to wake it."
name: White Stinger
recipeIngredient: 15 ml White crème de cacao liqueur

recipeInstructions.text: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass (preferably over a large cube or chunk of block ice)
